jobs.title: Software Engineer
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
3+ years of experience in software development

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description: Analyze and interpret complex data sets.
requirements: Master's degree in Data Science or related field
2+ years of experience in data analysis
tasks: Collect and analyze large data sets

jobs.title: Product Manager
jobs.description: Lead product development teams to create new products.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business or related field
5+ years of experience in product management
tasks: Coordinate with engineering and design teams

jobs.title: UX Designer
jobs.description: Design user interfaces and improve user experience.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Design or related field
4+ years of experience in UX design
Proficiency in design tools like Sketch, Figma
tasks: Collaborate with developers to implement designs
